          <title>
            <string language="en">Cathode ray oscilloscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kathodenstrahloszillograph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oscilloscope de rayon cathodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Osciloscópio do raio de cátodo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oscilloscopio del raggio catodico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλμογράφος ακτίνων καθόδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Osciloscopio del rayo catódico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the direction of an electron beam which is controlled by the X and Y plates in a cathode ray oscilloscope</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cathode ray tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron gun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Richtung eines 
Elektronenstrahls, welches durch die X und Y Platten in einem 
Kathodenstrahloszillograph gesteuert wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la direction d'un 
faisceau d'électrons ce qui est contrôlé par les plats de X et de Y
dans un oscilloscope de rayon cathodique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sentido de um feixe de
elétron qual é controlado pelas placas de X e de Y em um 
osciloscópio do raio de cátodo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il senso di un fascio
elettronico quale è gestito dalle piastre di Y e di X in un 
oscilloscopio del raggio catodico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κατεύθυνση μιας 
δέσμης ηλεκτρονίων που ελέγχεται από τα πιάτα Χ και Υ σε έναν 
παλμογράφο ακτίνων καθόδων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dirección de un haz
electrónico cuál es controlado por las placas de X y de Y en un 
osciloscopio del rayo catódico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kathodenstrahlröhre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronenstrahl</string>
          </keyword>
